title: Crash Bandicoot Resident Evil
description: This is my poster drawing for the resident evil x crash bandicoot mashup. In retrospect, i wish I had added a little more detail to the mansion but everything else seems okay to me.

title: Bauhaus saree
description: Desi goths are quite rare from what I've seen but I thought the idea of a bauhaus saree would be pretty cool. I wonder what Willow Scarlett thinks of it...or if i wrote the tattoo the right way.

title: Goths at the beach
description: Summertime has never been this dark.

title: Clone High part 1
description: The JFK x JDA shipping was like never before seen lol. Seeing people suddenly recognizing this show was an awesome thing to see cause for a while I felt like the only person who actually knew these shows existed. With the rise in popularity, I knew a revival was bound to happen but honestly from what I've seen of the reboot, I kinda wish they'd keep it in the grave.

title: Clone High part 2
description: Also was rushing to finish this second part with Joan wearing his shirt cause I knew there was going to be a thousand drawings like this.

title: Can't take a hint
description: I swear to [insert god here], guys who are this 'oblivious' are just pretending to be in order to avoid being thought of as creepy. Honestly, I do be like that too. I don't know how people get together anymore these days...

title: Nina's battle jacket
description: People talk about sowing on their patches and ironing them, but have you ever welded one on a battle jacket?

title: Nina vibing
description: No, the andrew eltritch funko pop is no longer available in stores.

title: Crash's Spyro Costume
description: Had someone I knew in a discord once submit this to a contest. Was awesome to see it in the video. Don't know where it is though it was so long ago.

title: Fruity telling a story
description: Seriously though like...why?

title: Fallout 1 Natalia
description: People only care about Natalia cause she cute and also has that bobcut but I can't avoid the blame though. I should get around to doing Max and Albert someday.

title: The gang
description: The boys....and girl! I got Fallout 1 for free on Steam during a flash sale and 20 minutes into playing, I looked up fanart of them but I didn't see much of the trio on the internet (Natalia had some more fanart). Had to give it a try...although the proportions might have ended up a little too cartoony. I probably would have shaped the limbs a little more if I had done now but I still think its okay. Also, it was featured on the r/ImaginaryFallout subreddit which was great! Honored to have received the best post of that year award!

title: Gaz playing
description: One of the few animation loops I have made so far. I'm actually happy about how it turned out.

title: Girl in the forest
description: Nature is beautiful, isn't it?

title: Froppy MHA
description: Was never an MHA fan but the frog girl seemed cool. For some reason, I feel like she would be an awesome bass player.

title: UWE Melinda Christian Death
description: Never watched this show but Melinda had to be drawn with a Christian Death tank. Just had to be done.

title: Christian Death Goth Princess
description: Can you tell I'm a big CD fan? (Rozz Williams' CD mostly).

title: Jiro Bauhaus shirt MHA
description: Again, not an MHA fan but Jiro also looked cool.

title: Joy Division Gaz
description: Same tbh.

title: Your favorite band is about to get shredded.
description: I'm honestly glad that he doesn't review goth bands cause I feel like one review would set me off.

title: New wave vs Gothic Rock
description: 'The duality of (wo)man' -Aristotle

title: Jill Valentine smokes a Minecraft zombie
description: The new mod looking great!

title: Sailor moon
description: Nothing else to say. It's Sailor Moon.

title: Samurai Jack Fallout 1
description: Long ago in the mojave wasteland....I, Aku the shape-shifting radioactive master of darkness, unleashed an UNSPEAKABLE EVIL! But a foolish vault dweller, wielding a magic 10mm pistol, steps forth to oppose. Before the final blow was struck, I tore open a portal in time and plunged him into the future, where my evil is law. Now the fool seeks to return and undo the future that is the unity.

title: Serena MTV downtown
description: Inb4 Downtown gets its own mediocre reboot.

title: Vision Video Goth
description: You're taking comfort in the grave! Finding closure as the dirt covers your face!

title: Susanne soccer
description: An old OC from a long time ago...ready to take the Phantoms to the finals!

title: Sonic OCs
description: I was asked once in a discord to make a drawing of their sonic ocs. I don't remember whos it was but all I can think about when I look at this is how tilted the one on the left is. Kinda bothers me.

title: Storyboard
description: A short disorganized storyboard with some old OCs.

title: Susanne finds a spider
description: She really loves her spiders. She has a whole collection of them!
